main event: A bluish white object was sighted, possibly a balloon or aircraft, in North Branch, New York on August 25, 1955.
interesting points: The object was at an altitude of 2500 ft., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes, The object had a front lighted semi-circle and a single blinking light at the rear, There were multiple conclusions drawn, including the possibility of it being an aircraft or astronomical phenomenon, The report was classified under Project Blue Book.
sighted object: bluish white object with a semi-circular front light
witness description: One witness was a teacher aged 37 and another was a housewife.
